channel.title: Last opption help please
channel.description:
I know how much this place hates java noobs but im grtting a lot better with java and kinda of knwo it but this isnt much to do with java
im an idiot at monster drops(about the only thing ive never edited on my server) so when my hob goblins started dropign what my tryas guards should have and my abby demons dont drop anymore but my smoke devils drop what my abberent specters should i have no idea what to do.
ive tried geting thier ids and searching for the drops lists to see if somehow they had been changed but ive no idea what im doing with the lists and i would rather not mess up my server even more so if anyone can help me trouble shoot here that would be wonderful thankyou.

item.title: Last opption help please
item.dc:creator: @wes wes
item.description:
@wes wrote:

you can come to my server and see that its high modified and a lot of people say i a great coder but i never mess with monsters because that what ruined my first server so i dont know much what to do here. i get no error message ect.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 06, 2006, 01:53:48 PM[/size][hr]i mean should this even be possible because the drop lists have jump creature i dont think that should be possible because the list is assigned to a certain id code [br][size=1]Posted at: August 06, 2006, 01:56:22 PM[/size][hr]come on people this is sopsoe to be a help section but all i see in other posts are people going
“pfft you fricking java noob learn somethign why dont ya”

we fucking would if you would help us der douche bags

Read full topic
